title: How to earn 25 to 30 lakh within 3-5 years of time - Quora

response.answer_text: If you want to earn that amount, then you need to buy a house now in an area which is developing. Once you do, you can sell that house for a profit of nearly 30–50 lakhs. You can also invest in gold if you want to earn in lakhs in a couple of years. No bank will give you that amount of interest so a fixed or a recurring deposit is out of question. If none of these seem feasible to you, then you can learn about the share market and invest heavily in it. If you are a master or you are adept in the share market then you can earn 10–15 lakhs in a year. Or even more if you are smart.
